Hermione?

Ginny?

Luna?

Fleur?

Anyone else?
1.title: Who will gain?

choices: Hermione embraces being chubby, and tries to get fat
Hermione is disgusted, and tries to diet
Hermione tells herself that she's not actually fat
Hermione let's herself go, genuinely not caring about her weight
Hermione is turned on, and asks Ron for advice
11.content:
Hermione had recently graduated from Hogwarts, having gone back after the Battle of Hogwarts to complete her schooling. Hermione lay on her bed, snacking on some muggle snacks. Her parents were dentists, so she took the opportunity of having her own home to eat all the sweet or fattening muggle junk food that she was never allowed to eat as a child. Lays packets and pizza boxes littered her room.

That night, Hermione went on a date with Ron. She took him to a muggle restaurant - an Italian restaurant with delicious, cheesy pizza. They ordered three pizzas: one for each of them and one to share. Hermione was half-way through the second pizza when she remembered that Ron also needed to eat from it. Her appetite had increased a lot over the pasts few months.

The next morning, Hermione stood in front of her mirror, naked. She cupped her boobs. They were bigger. That was good. She touched her belly. She could practically hold it. It was chubby. Her thighs were downright fat. They jiggled as she walked. Hermione realised that she was getting fat.
11.title: Hermione?

111.content:
Hermione was strangely turned on by what she saw. She actually liked being chubby. Throwing caution to the wind, Hermione decided to fatten herself up. She knew several spells that would help. One to increase her appetite, another to duplicate food, and a final to increase the kilojoule content in every snack. She would be sexily fat in no time.

Hermione's knew appetite was enormous. She ate an average of five pizzas, a cake, and three burgers per day. And that's not even including snacks. She always had enough snacks. More chocolate frogs than she would want to eat - literally. However, Hermione ate them anyway.

The thought of becoming fat was turning her on. Her belly bounced with her boobs as she walked, and her thighs jiggled, and rubbed against each other. Strangely, Hermione adored her new body. Once her belly spilled over into a huge muffin top, Hermione had to ask herself how fat she wanted to get.
111.title: Hermione embraces being chubby, and tries to ge...

choices: She continues eating like this until school starts again.
She decides she's going to go on a strict diet.
She decides she's going to get morbidly obease to spite Harry
12.content:
It had been about a month and a half sense Harry had broke up with Ginny after Dumbledore's funeral and she still hadn't gotten over it. Ginny had spent the better part of her summer so far moping, crying, being moody and eating, lots of eating. On this particular day she was in her normal position on the couch in The Burrow with her usual supply of Bertie Bott's, Chocolate Frogs and Fudge Flies in front of the T.V. with shows on that as usual she was not really watching.
"Mom!....MOM!" she cried out.
"What Ginny?" Ms. Weasly asked somewhat impatiently
"Can you get me another glass of that chocolate milk I'm out again" and the glass appeared in front of her thanks to Molly's magic.
"I Can't bloody wait until you're 17 so you can provide food and drinks for your self." Molly muttered under her breath.
"Thmanksh momth" Ginny attempted to say with her mouth full.
"Hey there greedy gut!" George yelled upon entering the room "How goes my favorite human food vacuum?"
"Shumth Up!" Ginny yelled back doing her best not to spit food everywhere, "I could beat you in a game of quidditch any day of the week" she retorted after swallowing.
"That's assuming you could get off that couch, by now I bet there's a rut in that spot you're lying on, i doubt it can handle all that extra weight" he said as he poked Ginny's bellybutton.
"You're awful!" Ginny screamed as she ran upstairs to her room, leaving the chocolate frog wrappers she had strewn about the couch flying in her wake.
"Give her a break George she went through a rough experience and is going through a phase it's not her fault, and anyway she hasn't even gained that much weight"
And in Ginny's defense that was true, chock it up to her metabolism, the fact that most magic treats are low in calories or something else but Ginny had only gained around 5lbs sense the break up mostly in her stomach, it was really only noticeable while she was sitting down and even then only as the lack of of definition. Georges finger could still easily feel the muscle that she had developed from her many adventures under maybe a quarter of a inch of flab.
She was really quite beautiful in the natural beauty kind of way, strong arms, pretty face, blue eyes, brilliantly red hair like the rest of the family, not much breasts or butt to speak of due to her weight and exercise but stunning none the less. But you wouldn't see that now as she was sobbing in her room and in between sobs shoveling chocolate frogs down her thought faster than they could hop.
12.title: Ginny

choices: They go to Diagon Alley to get supplies and new robes
121.content:
The rest of the summer had flown by not in much different of a manor than the first half had, Molly was still busy bustling about the house, Fred and George were still in everyone's faces and Ginny was still on her couch and still eating day in and day out. George's joke had actually partially come to fruition, on the few occasions Ginny did get up (usually to get something from the kitchen) a faint indent could be seen of her body on the couch, not because of her size but because of the constant existence of pressure on that spot.
As you could gather George's teasing did nothing to slow Ginny's eating, if anything she increased her consumption afterwords with each day bringing increasing amounts of food to go through her gullet into the seemingly endless pit that was her belly. And it was a bit of a belly by this point she had gained almost double what she had in the first part of the summer bringing her total gain to about 14lbs. Luckily for her the chub had started to disperse its self to other parts of her body at this point, she still was gaining at her gut now a slightly noticeable roundness mostly while sitting down while standing it protruded perhaps a inch outwards no more. Her breasts had also received some of the new mass on her body now forming respectable B cups, though she didn't realize because she rarely changed out of a T-shirt and sweat pants. At a glance she looked pretty much the same but this didn't stop the torments from Fred and George, but to their great disappointment she had learned to ignore their glib remarks telling herself they were just being their usual annoying selves and that she hadn't gained much weight if any at all. She was so confident in this in fact that she would usually face one of their jokes by shoving her mouth full with as much food as humanly possible until she could eat no more.
What she seemed to be unaware of was the exponential increase in the amount of food required to fill up that hungry belly of hers, with each day's gorging she was expanding the limits of her stomach so each day she would eat more and more.
Molly realized what was happening to her once petite daughter and knew that if something did not change quickly in the girl's lifestyle there may be no going back to the skinny body Ginny once knew but Molly figured that everything would go back to normal once Ginny returned to Hogwarts and a few extra pounds wouldn't hurt, the curves might even look good. This was the line of thinking that made Molly so happy when the owl arrived with the back to school list, it was time for everything to return to normal for her (not so) little girl.
121.title: She continues eating like this until school sta...

choices: Go out there bludging and bursting at the seams (quite litterally)
1211.content:
And so after about a week of delays and even more feasting Molly and her daughter went into Diagon Ally. It was strange for Ginny to go out into the world again, she was dreadfully pale and probably the only person in the ally wearing sweat pants (her excuse was that she wasn't going to change just to buy new clothes but she was secretly scared of what she would find when trying on her old clothes). After buying all her books, stopping by Fred and George's shop Ginny proposed going for brunch (she had already eaten breakfast) and to avoid a fight Molly agreed.
They went to a wizard buffet in the area. This was the first time Molly had seen Ginny eat a proper meal sense the beginning of the summer, she began to be concerned after the third heaping full plate of food was eaten. And this wasn't just food this was the fattiest most greasy stuff the restaurant had, Ginny had grown so accustomed to high calorie, low nutrition food that her body craved it like a drug and she didn't even realize. After the fifth plate was finished and Ginny pushed away the last plate Molly released a small sigh of relief, she hadn't realized how far this eating craze had gone. As she was about to ask for the check Ginny called over the dessert tray.
"Oh no you don't young lady!" she scolded.
"What? Sense when don't we eat dessert?" Ginny asked genuinely confused as it was a custom to finish a meal with some sort of treat.
"Sense you probably just had 10,000 calories? Have you noticed what you've been doing to your body?"
"Oh not you too mom, I get enough of that from Fred and George, I might have put on 5 pounds or so but it's no big deal everyone gains weight after a break up."
"Let's go get your robes, if you are still the same size as last year I promise I'll bring you to the ice cream bar and you can go wild" and they left for robes.
"Ah Ms. Weasly! Such a pleasure to see you! Alas only one left to sell robes too whatever will i do once young Ginny has graduated?" Cried the vendor as Molly and Ginny walked in the door "Ginny my growing girl should I take your measurements?" he asked after looking at her and noticing the newer additions to her body.
"Oh that won't be necessary but thank you, just use what you had last year." Ginny said entirely confident that she would be chowing down on some ice cream in less than 10 minutes and boy was she hungry for some.
"Yes mam' " the vendor said as he shot Molly a look that said something like "this is not going to end well" "here you are the changing room's over there as you know"
And so Ginny went into the small room to prove her mother wrong. "Who is she to comment on my weight" she thought as she pulled down her sweat pants revealing her panties that, as all wizard underwear, was charmed to always fit perfectly "I could fit 5 of me in her probably". As she took off her baggy T-Shirt she looked at the full body mirror and oblivious to the slightly protruding paunch that after the last week of binging was pushing its self into the pretty noticeable category, nowhere near fat just not skinny. She was also either not seeing or choosing not to see her wider hips and thighs that now had a little jiggle to them, once again none of this made her look fat or even chubby but it was a pretty far cry from the petite, curve-less figure she was used too and a far cry from the size 0 uniform she held in her hands. Even ignoring the changes in most of her body she did see something. "Strange I must have grabbed one of Hermione's BB bras this morning while getting dressed, it's even a bit snug!" And it was, she wasn't quite spilling out of it but her breasts were looking for some extra breathing room. "I guess any weight I gained went straight to these babies" she thought as she cupped her own cups with a capital C in her hands "look what Harry left" she thought with a only slightly naughty smile.
"Everything all right in there?" Asked molly quite loudly as she was expecting to hear the grunting and groaning of a girl trying desperately to fit into clothes that are at least one and most likely two or three sizes too small coming from the small waiting room by this point.
"Yeah I'll be out in a sec!" Ginny called back pulled out of the trance she had been put in by her blooming bosoms. The skirt was pulled up first, Ginny never undid the button of her skirts before putting them on, there wasno need they always simply slipped on. This strategy encountered resistance about 2/3's the way up her thighs. "Ugh what's wrong with these things" she thought to herself as she slowly wriggled the seemingly shrinking garment toward her butt. By the time it got to the bottom of her now rounded bottom even she had accepted there would be no sliding up that so the button was unbuttoned. She situated the top of the skirt at it's usual location, that being right below her belly button and started to close it. And started again, and again, and again only to be stopped by a soft jiggly substance coating her belly at every attempt "wow when you don't work out for a summer I guess abs turn really soft" she rationalized so she moved downward right below the little hill of "soft ab" and her pantie line. Here it only took four tries to button the skirt that due to the expanded hips and booty was much shorter than normal so that if she bent over (and the button didn't pop off) nothing was hidden. This also created a problem for the next step of the process that being the over flowing muffin top. Were you looking at Ginny wearing normally sized clothes you never would have been able to guess a muffin top would be possible but this skirt managed it. Obliviously pushing on Ginny picked up the button down shirt. She preceded to put it on ignoring the obvious problems the first of which being that with the additional surface area the muffin top provided the cloth simply did not cover the entirety of her exposed flesh leaving a circle of flab going around the top of her skirt and uncovered by the shirt. The next issue was the fact that it was obvious that she was spilling out of the shirt, the buttons were strained at every stress point and the top couple of buttons couldn't even be buttoned leaving much of Ginny's now ample amount of cleavage exposed and pushing out leaving the impression of either a prostitute or simply a slut. Lucky for Ginny the typical Gryffindor sweater covered her cascading flesh at the bottom of the outfit but the outline was easily noticeable and the V neck cut of the sweater did nothing to contain the overly exposed top half. Ginny looked at herself in the mirror for the first time sense she started this process and was shocked, she was bulbous, fat would be a exaggeration but this tiny outfit made her normal sized body look like a series of fat outcrops, it took every ounce of fat on her and made it a spectacle for anyone who may see. Ginny knew she couldn't get her ice cream going out like this, and surprisingly this was her first thought the weight gain was a side matter because she was starving and she was refusing to let it sink in. In light of this she had two choices, suck it up and starve for lack of ice cream and walk out there or cast a little expansion charm on the clothes. She pondered this for a couple of seconds and decided to...
1211.title: They go to Diagon Alley to get supplies and new...

choices: Despite her diet, Ginny still becomes rather fat
Ginny gives up on her diet completely and becomes obese
122.content:
After a few weeks, Ginny realised that she'd become chubby. Her face was bloated. Her boobs were bigger. Her belly hung over her pants. She would be fat soon. Ginny needed to find a way to prevent herself from getting fat. A diet was in order.

When Ginny told her family about her new diet, everyone was very supportive. However, George enjoyed poking fun at his sister's fat gain, and was secretly attracted to her fat body. He couldn't allow for her to get skinny again.

Ginny ate nothing but salads, and excercised regularly. How was she not losing any weight? If anything, she had gained weight. Her belly hugged her thighs when she sat, and she could feel her thighs jiggling as she walked. How could this happen? Okay, sure, she ate some of the snacks George offered her at times, but that surely couldn't fatten her up.

Unbeknownst to Ginny, the chocolate frogs and Bertie Bots Evry Flavour Beans that George had been giving her were charmed to contain many more calories than their regular counterparts. George would not make this diet easy.
122.title: She decides she's going to go on a strict d...

choices: Hermione visits and acts as Ginny's feeder
Ginny finds a spell to force herself to be lazy
123.content:
After a few weeks, Ginny realised that she was actually getting fat. Her thighs were thick and jiggly, her belly spilled over her pants, and for the first time ever, she had genuinely big boobs. Ginny's first thought was one of horror. How would Harry ever take her back? She was getting so fat? On second thought, maybe that was a good idea. Harry will come next see her as an obese slob. She would make sure of that, out of pure spite.

Ginny bought large amounts of sweets and goodies. Not a single one ever lasted long. She became dedicated to being lazy. Ginny' spot was now always full. She hardly moved. Ginny's muffin top started looking impressive, and her butt was huge, but she needed to be much fatter to truly spite Harry the next time they meet. After doing some research, Ginny found a spell that would make her eternally hungry, and perfected a spell to duplicate items. She was going to have a lot of chocolate frogs.

After a few more weeks, Ginny was truly obese. So fat, in fact, that George stopped with his jokes, worried that calling her an elephant was uncomfortably close to reality. The Weasley's were terribly worried about Ginny, but truth be told, she loved getting fat. None of Ginny's old clothe fit anymore. Her jeans were terribly large, but still tight. Her belly was huge, overflowing, and uncontainable. Her boobs had doubled in size.

At first, Ginny was fattening up to spite Harry, but soon, she began to appreciate the feeling of never being full, and always being able to feast on scores of food. She loved her fat body. She loved feeling lazy. There was no way that this would stop. But how would she get fatter?
123.title: She decides she's going to get morbidly obe...

13.content: Ok so does she gain it at school or over the summer
13.title: Luna?

choices: A week of practice of the curse
More months of having Ginny use the curse on her.
131.content:
The year had been going on for quite a bit now, Umbridge was at the height of her power, while someone else was at the height of their gain, a pale blond girl with blue eyes came calmly entering a DA meeting her belly stuck out a very noticeable bit in her robes, so much so that if you looked hard enough you could see some soft squishy pale flesh jiggle with every step, a calm voice spoke "I hope you don't mind me being late. The nargles took my shoes again." She said, her double chin shaking between some panting from entering so quickly.

Harry nodded, and continued to instruct stupefy to a fourth year, Luna volunteered to help him practise, and the first time she was hit by it was tossed back next to Harry, a very visiblse double chin jiggling with some large thunder thighs and her rather rotund belly. Harry pulled his robes downward a bit.

"Next up, the hunger curse, best used when you're fighting in a place where there's lots of food, like the great hall." Said Harry, Luna knew she needed to try this as a means to continue her gain, which became a goal after nargle hunting was boring "I'll volunteer, Harry Potter." Luna spoke up smiling, one by one, the students tried and succeeded to do it on her, and every time she became hungrier.
131.title: Luna Lovegood

1313.content: A few months of Ginny using the curse on Luna was definitely doing something not only was Luna stuffing herself just about all the time now but she was noticeably much fatter now. Luna let out a big burp as she finished eating a pumpkin pasties in her dorm alone while crums rolled down her now triple chin. Luna looked around and saw she had plenty more food to eat
1313.title: More months of having Ginny use the curse on her.
